item.description:
NO PARTNER OR EXPERIENCE REQUIRED!

In this 6-week class series, you will learn four dances: the Jumpin' Jive, the Sultry Salsa, the Crazy Cha-Cha and the Diva Disco. Each class consists of a simple breakdown of the dance followed by first a slow and then a faster version- resulting in a great fat-burning workout and in the last class we combine all the steps and dances weâ€™ve learned for one big Dance-Off PARTY!

This is a 6 week class series.
Wednesday nights 6-7:00pm
*Dates: 10/7, 10/14, 10/28, 11/4, 11/11 and 11/18
Pricing: 6 Class Series: $72/person
Registration Required
Space is limited
*Please note: No class week of 10/21

For more information about Amy or for pricing, locations and a complete dance and fitness class schedule, please visit: www.zumbadancewithamy.com or call 978-500-8943.
item.name: Cardio Ballroom Basics
